original_title: Neil Young with Crazy Horse - Psychedelic Pill
overview: BluRay release of the 2012 Neil Young & Crazy Horse album, Psychedelic Pill. Recorded right after Americana at Audio Casa Blanca, this includes videos for each of the songs at high resolution 192kHz/24bit full fidelity audio.
tagline: I used to walk like a giant on the land
title: Neil Young with Crazy Horse - Psychedelic Pill
